name: Bounce Fever
description:
Get ready for a game that will keep you coming back over and over again! Bounce Fever is a super addictive casual game where your job is simple, just get your ball to the STAR to reach the next room. It sounds simple, but trust us when we say its NO! Good luck!

FEATURES

- Super easy tap controls.
- Over 50 levels to master.
- Awesome soundtrack.
- Multiple balls to unlock.
